entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
Happy Birthday Mr. President!
America is blessed beyond measure to have you in the White House. You're promoting all that is good and decent in our land as you battle for all Americans.
🇺🇸We are behind you!🇺🇸
@realDonaldTrump
#MAGA #KAG #FoxNews
#HappyBirthdayTrump
